description: This file defines UI composable functions for the Home screen in a Kotlin-based Android app using Jetpack Compose. It displays a grid of recipe cards sourced from fake data.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: A composable function displaying the main home screen, fetching recipe data, and displaying it in a grid.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: A composable displaying recipes in a lazy vertical grid layout.
